tool_description: Verifies availability of required equipment for specified dates and identifies any gaps that need to be addressed through rental or purchase.

session_date.description: Planned session date in YYYY-MM-DD format

inventory_type.description: Equipment source: owned, rental, or mixed

error_messages: Empty equipment list: Must provide at least one equipment item to check
Invalid date format: Session date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Invalid inventory type: Must be 'owned', 'rental', or 'mixed'
Equipment list too long: Maximum 50 items can be checked at once
usage: Provide the equipment list from requirements calculator, session date, and inventory type. Returns availability status and recommendations for unavailable items.

unavailable_items.description: Equipment items that are not available

availability_summary.description: Summary of equipment availability and recommendations
